translation.zh: -你是谁啊？-我是愚蠢的机器人

translation.en: That may be the only honest thing I've ever heard a robot say, actually.
translation.zh: 这可能是我听过的机器人讲的唯一一句真话

translation.en: But, you've got to go. I have bigger problems to deal with.
translation.zh: 但你得走了 我有更大的问题要处理

translation.en: I don't want you here.
Don't you-- Don't you get it?
I hate robots!
I really enjoyed looking through your personal belongings.
translation.zh: 我十分享受翻阅你的私人物品

translation.en: You're still super creepy.
Would you please just go?
[Molly] Mai, don't forget to brush your teeth before bed.
translation.zh: 小麦 睡前别忘刷牙

translation.en: Four out of five dentists recommend me!
Stupid parental settings!
[brush] Floss twice a day.
-Hey! -[laser zaps]
Tartar kills. Floss.
Holy mother of toast!
Wait, wait, wait! Wait a second.
What was that exactly?
A phased plasma rifle in the 40GW range.
-Are you sure that's legal? -Legal?
So, why'd you track me down again?
You said you needed your bag.
Well, what do you say we make a deal?
translation.zh: 好的 我们不如做个交易？

translation.en: I don't know. What do I say?
Okay, listen. You're gonna stay here tonight.
translation.zh: 好的听着 你今天可以住在这里

translation.en: Understand?
Stay.
Not you, Momo.
I knew that. You judging me, bro?
translation.zh: 我知道 你对我有意见 兄弟？

translation.en: I can keep this?
Well, if you do me a solid. You can keep it.
translation.zh: 如果你帮我大忙的话 就给你

translation.en: -Come on, Momo. -He's judging me.
translation.zh: -走吧 馍馍-他对我有意见

translation.en: Now, get some rest or whatever it is that robots do.
translation.zh: 休息一下吧 按照你们机器人的方式

translation.en: We're going to have a big day tomorrow.
[Momo] You see that? I see you judging me!
translation.zh: 看见了吗？我知道你对我有意见

translation.en: [motherboard] Warning. Current memory will fill in 48 hours.
translation.zh: 警告当前记忆模块将在48小时内装满

translation.en: Recommendation: delete overflow memory to clear space and avoid input lock.
translation.zh: 建议：删除多余记忆以清理空间避免锁定输入

translation.en: Who's out there? I swear, [bleep].
I will bite your head off--
Space cleared. Warning: core memory fail error.
translation.zh: 空间已清理警告：核心记忆模块出错

translation.en: Current memory will fill in 51 hours.
translation.zh: 当前记忆模块将在51小时内装满

translation.en: [Dr. Rice] Oh.
You know I created you, right?
translation.zh: 你知道是我创造了你 对吧？

translation.en: Dr. Tanner Rice.
Oh, hey. Justin. Sorry.
translation.zh: 你好 贾廷 抱歉

translation.en: [stuttering] Something-- Something wrong with the line?
No, no!
Just wanted a little check in, that's all.
There was an incident today.
-On the freeway. -Oh, well then--
With an unsanctioned robot of your design.
translation.zh: 出事的是你设计的未经批准的机器人

translation.en: I'm curious. Are we not giving you enough to do?
translation.zh: 我只是好奇 你是不是没事干啊？

translation.en: -No, no. -We're not?
Wait, I mean...
Yes. All right, look, okay. I can explain.
Don't bother, I like to think I've been pretty relaxed about your side projects.
translation.zh: 不用了 我向来不干涉你的私下项目

translation.en: Yeah, I think it's just great that you keep pushing me.
But I need you to be concentrating on the Gen 6.
translation.zh: 但我需要你把精力都放在Q宝6上

translation.en: Ta-da!
-[robot] Hey, guys. -Remember, one in every home.
No, I know, I know. My mind has been a little--
translation.zh: 我知道 最近思绪有点乱

translation.en: No more side projects, no more distractions.
translation.zh: 不要再做私下项目 不要再分心

translation.en: -Think of that. -It won't be a problem anymore.
There you go.
The only robots I want making news, doctor, are the Q-Bots.
translation.zh: 我只希望在新闻上看到Q宝机器人而不是其他机器人

translation.en: Yeah, I just--
"One in every home."
-Show them what you've got. -What are you waiting for?
[girl] Almost there, come on.
translation.zh: 快到了 加油 继续运球

translation.en: Come on!
Take the shot!
What?
-What? -[kid] Who shot that?
[Mai] 'Sup, fools.
Have you got a short memory or something, Su?
translation.zh: 你是不是记性不好啊 苏小麦？

translation.en: [all Q-Bots] On the bright side, it's a really beautiful day for a beating.
translation.zh: 好消息今天晴空万里 是揍人的好天气

translation.en: It sure is.
-Say the thing. -Oh, right.
You best not be stepping to me, bruh.
"Bruh?"
You think this is a game?
No, this is payback.
I mean, well, this is a game. But, you know.
Whatever, get her off my field.
translation.zh: 别废话了 滚出我的球场

translation.en: What do you say? Three rounds, nothing in the face?
translation.zh: 怎么样？三个回合 不打脸

translation.en: Wow, nice catch.
-What was that? -What's going on?!
My robot!
Boom.
[kid] Is this what karma feels like?
That's what I'm talking about. Woohoo!
Thank you.
Did I... do you a solid?
Is our deal done?
-We're not done. -We're not?
We're just getting started.
Yeah.
♪ 'Cause we only got one life to live I'm on a psychic safari ♪
[host] Welcome back to the big show!
It's me, Wang Nima.
-Thank you. -[woman] You're awesome, Justin!
We're back with IQ Robotic's CEO, Justin Pin.
translation.zh: 来到现场的嘉宾是IQ智造公司首席执行官庞贾廷

translation.en: Talking about this little guy, the new Q-Bot Gen 6.
translation.zh: 谈这些小家伙 新一代Q宝6

translation.en: [Wang Nima] Wow!
Well, I know I'm going to run right out and pick mine up.
Oh, that's good.
Hey, Justin. Changing subject for a second,
-I have a question. -I'm all ears.
Have you heard about this robot rampage on the freeway?
translation.zh: 有没有听说过在高速公路横冲直撞的机器人？

translation.en: Word is, it looks like one of your robots was doing all the damage.
translation.zh: 据说是你的机器人做的

translation.en: Well, I mean, we've got a lot going on these days.
But yes, of course, I have heard about this tragic event.
translation.zh: 当然 这个悲剧事件我听说过

translation.en: I've been assured by my people as well as the proper authorities,
translation.zh: 但是我的团队以及相关部门已经向我保证

translation.en: this dangerous and counterfeit robot has been destroyed.
translation.zh: 这个危险的山寨机器人已经销毁

translation.en: It is 100%, definitely, you can take it to the bank, dead.
translation.zh: 百分百的 彻底销毁

translation.en: Oh, I see. It's dead. Oh, poor little guy.
translation.zh: 明白 销毁了 可怜的小家伙

translation.en: -Play the clip! -What? I don't have-- Oh you--
[woman] What is happening? Oh!
Wow, this is-- I'm seeing this footage for the first time.
translation.zh: 哇 我头一次见到这些视频

translation.en: That's very out of character for our robots. Don't you think?
translation.zh: 太不符合我们产品的风格了你说是吧？

translation.en: Oh, I mean look at that. That's not--
That's horrible.
So, you're telling me, it's not an IQ Robot?
translation.zh: 你是说 这不是你们公司的机器人？

translation.en: Oh, good Lord, no!
No, our operation is perfect.
-Oh. -Okay? I would never allow
something like that to come out of IQ.
translation.zh: IQ公司制造像这样的东西

translation.en: No, no, no. Besides, we're a little more into connecting people.
translation.zh: 不不不 而且我们更关注与人的沟通

translation.en: than taking them apart.
Give it up for Justin Pin, everybody.
translation.zh: 热烈掌声献给庞贾廷 各位

translation.en: -[man] Go Justin! -[girl] I love him!
And I was like, "You want a piece of [bleep]?"
And then, bam! Scrap metal! You don't [bleep] with Momo, son!
I love this [bleep] thing.
You know, there's something wrong with your small mammal.
translation.zh: 你的小型哺乳动物有点问题

translation.en: He likes you, no big deal.
-Have we met? -Oh, you don't remember me.
I don't remember you too, bruh.
translation.zh: 我也不记得你了 兄弟

translation.en: -What's that? -Oh, this? This is nothing.
-Why do you ask? -[motherboard] Warning, memory low.
translation.zh: -有什么好问的-警告 记忆空间不足

translation.en: Anyway, goodnight.
Hey, is something wrong?
You should go to bed. Your mom will worry.
translation.zh: 你回去睡觉吧 你妈会担心的

translation.en: Nice try, dude. Come on, what's up?
translation.zh: 别来这一套 哥们儿 怎么了？

translation.en: Woah!
[motherboard] Warning: current memory will fill in 18 hours.
translation.zh: 警告：当前记忆模块将在18小时内装满

translation.en: Recommendation: clear space to avoid catastrophic system reset.
translation.zh: 建议：清理空间以避免灾难性系统重置

translation.en: That sounds bad. Is that bad?
translation.zh: 听起来很严重 是吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm broken.
If my storage gets too full, I won't be able to make new memories
translation.zh: 如果存储太满 就无法进行新的记忆

translation.en: and my brain will shut down.
Well what about that? Can't you get rid of all that stuff?
That stuff? No, those are my core systems.
translation.zh: 那些？不行 那是核心系统

translation.en: I'd gain storage, but I'd lose functionality.
translation.zh: 删掉会增加存储空间但会丢失功能

translation.en: Oh, man. That's rough. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 那是比较困难了 真惨

translation.en: It's fine, I just delete a few memories every night.
translation.zh: 没事 我每晚删除一些记忆

translation.en: -That way, I don't lose them all. -How do you know which to keep?
translation.zh: -那样就不会全部丢失了-怎么知道应该保留哪些呢？

translation.en: Well, I keep the important ones.
But the real problem is, the more memories I make,
translation.zh: 但真正的问题是 记忆越多

translation.en: the harder it is to choose what to forget.
translation.zh: 越难选择应该忘记哪些

translation.en: Let me help.
I'm pretty sure there are things not worth remembering.
translation.zh: 肯定有不值得记忆的事情

translation.en: Really?
Okay, then.
What would you delete if you had to choose?
translation.zh: 如果你得作出选择 你会怎么做？

translation.en: Oh, wait. Play that one.
No, you're the stupid robot.
translation.zh: 不 你才是愚蠢的机器人

translation.en: There you go, delete that one.
But that memory's special.
We'd just met.
How come no one every told me I have an ugly mad face?
translation.zh: 为什么没人跟我说过我生气时脸很丑

translation.en: I can't delete that.
-It's you, Mai. -That's not me!
translation.zh: -是你的画面 小麦-才不是我呢

translation.en: If you delete that memory, I'll still be here.
translation.zh: 如果你删掉那段记忆我依然在这里

translation.en: We can make some other ones, it'll be cool. Trust me.
translation.zh: 可以再拍 会很酷的 相信我

translation.en: I trust you.
-[buzz] -[motherboard] Space cleared.
Does it hurt?
I don't know.
Once it's gone, there's nothing. Like it was never there.
translation.zh: 删掉就没了 就好像从来没存在过

translation.en: Like it was never there.
I'm being selfish. What about...
-Enough! -Don't. Matthew!
Mai, are you okay?
Are you hurt?
What? No, it's fine.
-[bottle shatters] -Goodnight, I guess.
Hey, keep it real, yo.
You too. Keep it real.
translation.zh: 你也一样 做人要酷一点

translation.en: Yo.
[Justin] Hey.
[Justin] Do you recognize this?
So, I'm just curious. You made this, right?
translation.zh: 我说真的 是你造了它 对吧？

translation.en: All by yourself, in your free time?
translation.zh: 空闲时间你一人的杰作？

translation.en: Look, I'm not mad about this. I mean, it's pretty cool, right there.
translation.zh: 我并不生气 这个也很酷

translation.en: I could really use a robot like that.
translation.zh: 这种机器人我可能也用得着

translation.en: I mean you betrayed me and I have to kill you now
translation.zh: 你背叛了我 现在只能杀了你

translation.en: but I could-- No, no. Can you stop? Please, just listen.
I can't understand what you're saying. You know what, never mind.
translation.zh: 我听不清楚你在说什么 算了

translation.en: He's alive. He's not dead.
I mean, I could find the robot.
I could tap into the Q-Bot video feed, so we could see everything they all do.
translation.zh: 我能调用Q宝机器人的视频数据他们做什么都能看见

translation.en: All the Q-Bots everywhere. They'll be our eyes.
translation.zh: 各地所有的Q宝 都是我们的眼线

translation.en: I'll find it!
One second.
Guys...
Let's do that then.
-[robot] Hello, small rodent. -[Momo yells]
-Good morning, Mai. -Oh! Hey, dude.
translation.zh: -早上好 小麦-你好！哥们儿

translation.en: Woah, nice.
All right, so what do you want to do today?
We have a lot of options.
Hey, what's that?
This? A baseball bat.
What's it for?
You know, for hitting baseballs. It's a game.
translation.zh: 打棒球 是一种比赛

translation.en: -Do people get hurt in baseball? -Depends on who's playing.
translation.zh: 打棒球会使人受伤吗？ 看跟谁打了

translation.en: -Mai, I was thinking-- -[Mai] Hmm?
Well, maybe you and me, maybe we could play a game today.
translation.zh: 今天你和我不如玩点游戏吧？

translation.en: You need to teach me. Maybe not baseball, probably, but...
translation.zh: 你教我 打棒球就免了

translation.en: Soccer or something? Something like that.
Why?
Oh, I just mean. What if...
We do one day where we don't, you know, blow stuff up.
Aren't you having a good time?
translation.zh: 你难道玩得不开心吗？我以为你很开心

translation.en: I thought we were having a good time just hanging out.
translation.zh: 你难道玩得不开心吗？我以为你很开心 和我一起玩

translation.en: No, no, we are. Are you kidding? It's the best.
translation.zh: 不不 很开心开什么玩笑 最开心了

translation.en: I really like hanging out.
It's been great, I have lots of cool memories now
translation.zh: 非常棒 我有了很多很酷的记忆

translation.en: -of us hanging out. -Okay, so why do you want to bail?
translation.zh: -我们一起玩的记忆-好的 那你为什么怂了？

translation.en: -I don't! -Because we can't quit now.
There's way to much injustice in the world.
translation.zh: -我没怂！-我们现在不能收手 世界上有太多的不公咱俩一起能改变这一切

translation.en: Like, together we can fix it.
translation.zh: 世界上有太多的不公咱俩一起能改变这一切

translation.en: So, nobody has to get hurt ever again.
translation.zh: 这样大家就不用再受伤了

translation.en: I would never let you get hurt.
Well, there you go. See?
[Dr. Rice] He's alive. Find the robot.
translation.zh: 他还活着 把他找出来

translation.en: He's alive. Find the robot.
translation.zh: 他还活着 把他找出来

translation.en: He's alive, find the robot. He's alive, find the robot. He's alive--
translation.zh: -他还活着 把他找出来-他还活着 把他找出来 他还活着…

translation.en: He's alive, find the robot. Okay.
translation.zh: 他还活着 把他找出来 好的

translation.en: Oh, of course! Find the girl,
then I find the robot.
[robot] Oh, they put a pizza place there.
translation.zh: 哦 那里开了家披萨店

translation.en: [singing along] ♪ Don't you know it's noodle time ♪
translation.zh: 你不知道吗 吃面时间到了

translation.en: ♪ It's noodle ti-- ♪
-Coming through. -Ah!
Bye! Hey, why are you so mean to everyone?
translation.zh: -再见！-嗨！你们为什么老是欺负人？

translation.en: Apologize.
Please accept my apologies, ma'am. She's quite the scamp, I dare say.
translation.zh: 请接受我的道歉 女士我得说 她挺没家教的

translation.en: Oh.
Well, I guess it's no problem, really.
-[kids laugh] -[girl] Oh, yeah.
Again, so sorry.
Don't worry. I got this.
No, Mai. Really it's okay.
translation.zh: 不 小麦 没事的

translation.en: -You don't have to do this. -You want to try that again, Greenwood?
translation.zh: -不要帮我出头-你记性不好吗 花木青？

translation.en: Oh. Hello, Mai.
Where's your little friend?
It's time you jokers learned we don't take no smack off of nobody.
translation.zh: 是时候给你们点颜色看看了

translation.en: "Jokers?" "Smack?"
I totally understand what she's talking about.
-Oh, no. -Attack!
-[kid] Look out! -Hey, it's the girl.
[punk rock music playing] ♪ Noodles! Noodle time ♪
Do something! Let's go!
Stop it. That's not fair.
[Mai] That's what I'm talking about.
-Get 'em! -Me? Woah, take it easy.
translation.zh: -解决它们！-我来？哇 别这么火大

translation.en: What are you doing?
-Blast her! -[Greenwood and robot] What?
-I can't do that. -No, I didn't mean kill her.
You know, beat her up. Something.
I want her to hurt like how she hurt me.
translation.zh: 她怎么伤害我的我就要让她自己也尝尝滋味

translation.en: No, Mai. You don't want that.
translation.zh: 不 小麦 这样不行

translation.en: I mean, she's just a kid like you.
translation.zh: 她跟你一样 也只是个孩子

translation.en: Listen. I'm sorry, okay?
translation.zh: 听我说 对不起 好吧？

translation.en: I wasn't doing anything.
What is wrong with you anyway, you crazy little freak? -[Mai grunts] -[Greenwood screams]
translation.zh: 你有毛病吗 这样发神经？

translation.en: [robot] Why are you so angry?
[Mai] What do you know about it?
You're just a stupid robot.
translation.zh: 你只是一台愚蠢的机器人

translation.en: [robot] Maybe you and Greenwood can be friends?
translation.zh: 或许你和花木青可以试着做朋友

translation.en: I thought...
I thought you were my friend.
translation.zh: 我以为你就是我的朋友

translation.en: I am. I am your friend.
translation.zh: 是啊 我是你的朋友

translation.en: -[clank] -Mai, wait!
[motherboard] Warning: current memory will fill in eight hours.
translation.zh: 警告：当前记忆模块将在8小时内装满

translation.en: Recommendation: delete overflow memory to avoid catastrophic shut down.
translation.zh: 建议：删除多余记忆以避免灾难性系统崩溃

translation.en: [Mai] You're just a stupid robot.
translation.zh: 你只是一台愚蠢的机器人

translation.en: [Mai] Blast her!
[motherboard] You're about to delete the weapons control system.
translation.zh: 你即将删除武器控制系统

translation.en: This is a core system.
Weapons will be unavailable until full system reset.
translation.zh: 在完全系统重置之前将无法使用武器

translation.en: Are you sure you want to do this?
Space cleared. Weapons inactive.
translation.zh: 空间已清理 武器搁置

translation.en: Hey, Mai.
You were right. I was able to delete my weapons and--
translation.zh: 你说得没错 我删掉了武器就好…

translation.en: Mai?
[sighs] Was I wrong?
Yep.
I guess he was just trying to help.
I don't know.
Look, you were wrong and he was right.
I mean you were being a brat and he was trying to be a stand-up guy.
translation.zh: 你在乱来 他很够意思

translation.en: Good Lord, woman--
Sometimes, I think you're going to be my best and only friend forever.
translation.zh: 有时我觉得你会永远是我最好的朋友也是唯一的朋友

translation.en: At least you'll never leave me. Will you, buddy?
translation.zh: 至少你不会离我而去 对吧 哥们儿？

translation.en: No you won't. Oh, no you won't.
You know what, [bleep] that guy. He's dead to me.
translation.zh: 跟你说 我就当他死了

translation.en: Oh! What's up, man?
How much did you just hear? Cause I was-- They were just jokes.
translation.zh: 你刚才听到什么了？我们在开玩笑罢了

translation.en: [robot] I made you a gift.
The most important parts of me...
are the memories of you.
It hurts when I lose them.
translation.zh: 如果没了 我会很痛

translation.en: You lost something too.
Listen,
would it help if I promise you I'll never let you down again?
translation.zh: 如果我保证不会再让你失望你会不会好过点？

translation.en: How can you promise something like that?
People leave and there's nothing you can do about it.
I don't know. You're probably right.
translation.zh: 我不知道 你应该说得没错吧

translation.en: I do know I don't want to lose you.
translation.zh: 但我知道 我不想失去你

translation.en: Then, maybe...
don't lose me.
Mai, if I lost you, I'd be lost too.
translation.zh: 小麦 如果失去你 我自己也会迷失

translation.en: So...
we cool?
-You got my back? -I do got your back.
Then, yeah, we cool.
Oh!
Mom, don't freak out.
Look, I can explain.
I think you'd better get your robot, young lady.
translation.zh: 你最好把你的机器人找来 小姑娘

translation.en: -[whirring] -Okay, okay.
Optical CRT intact.
Brachial prismatic joints are fine.
Motor responses...
This is where you removed your memory storage unit.
translation.zh: 你从这里取出了记忆存储单元

translation.en: Uh-huh. I'm broken.
Don't worry. I can fix it.
translation.zh: -呃 我坏了-别担心 我能修好

translation.en: This chip contains a full system restore point.
translation.zh: 这个芯片含有完整的系统重置备份

translation.en: A disc image from when I first created you.
translation.zh: 我起初创造你时的镜像盘

translation.en: Run this and you'll be like new again. A fresh start.
translation.zh: 运行一下就焕然一新了

translation.en: Wait, a fresh start?
Does that mean I lose my memories?
translation.zh: 也就是说我的记忆会丢失？

translation.en: -Woah, hands off hippy! -Mai, don't be cute.
translation.zh: -别动手动脚！-小麦 有点礼貌

translation.en: -Want to tell me what this is all about? -This is Dr. Rice, Mai,
translation.zh: -这是怎么回事啊？-这位是米博士 小麦

translation.en: and that's his Q-Bot.
No, no. This isn't a Q-Bot. This is-- He is...
translation.zh: 不 这不是Q宝 他是…

translation.en: something special. He has a purpose.
translation.zh: 特制的 有专门目的

translation.en: [Q-Bot] Oh, I didn't know we were expecting company.
-Can I offer you a lava ca-- -[electric shock]
translation.zh: 不然就给你来一块榴莲蛋糕了

translation.en: Woah, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 不然就给你来一块榴莲蛋糕了 你干嘛啊？

translation.en: -Sorry, listen-- -[Q-Bot] Sandlewood.
Listen, something terrible is about to happen.
translation.zh: 听我说 可怕的事情即将发生

translation.en: 7723 is our only hope stopping it. I designed him to stop it.
translation.zh: 7723是扭转局势的唯一希望我设计它就是为了这个目的

translation.en: -I get it. He's a weapon. -What?
-Why would you put weapons in a robot? -Because it's awesome.
translation.zh: -机器人装武器干嘛？-因为很赞

translation.en: Awesome indeed.
I'm sorry, is now a bad time?
I mean, should I come back? I could always come back.
-Who is this? How'd you get in here? -Justin Pin?
Oh, my gosh. I'm a huge fan, I'm your biggest fan.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 我是你的超级粉丝最死忠的粉丝

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm a huge fan of you!
Ah, Dr, Tanner Rice here, really should be more careful with this secret project.
translation.zh: 米大力博士应该对这个秘密项目更加谨慎

translation.en: -Well this has been really great but-- -Justin.
My old friend. If you're in there, please hear me.
translation.zh: 老朋友 如果你还是你的话 请听我说

translation.en: Don't you remember the old days?
Come on. Dude, it was so awesome!
translation.zh: 拜托 兄弟 很棒的

translation.en: I mean, building robots for the people.
Before Ares. Before all of this.
translation.zh: 造战王之前 这一切发生之前

translation.en: -[Q-Bot] Foot rub later? -[Dr. Rice] Come on. This isn't us.
translation.zh: -等会儿捏个脚？-拜托 我们不是这样的

translation.en: Seriously, when did making the world a better place become killing people?
translation.zh: 怎么会从创造美好未来变成要杀人了？

translation.en: I actually think "killing people" is making the world a better place.
translation.zh: 我真的认为杀人就是在创造美好未来

translation.en: But I'm glad that we have this out in the open.
translation.zh: 不过能把话都说开 我很高兴

translation.en: Secrets hurt after all, right?
translation.zh: 保守秘密很辛苦 对吧？

translation.en: I think he wants to kill us.
Oh, no, no. Not you per say, but just people in general.
translation.zh: 不不不 不是指你们是说全人类

translation.en: I want to kill them, all of them. Most of them.
translation.zh: 我要把人都杀光 大部分杀掉

translation.en: Whatever. Look, don't worry. Once it gets rolling,
translation.zh: 随便啦 别担心 一旦开始

translation.en: thinks will be happening really quickly.
Boom, boom, boom. Trust me, it will be fine.
translation.zh: 砰砰砰 相信我 没问题的

translation.en: -Justin Pin's a bad guy? -That explains a lot actually.
translation.zh: -庞贾廷是坏人？-已经够明显的了！

translation.en: But he's messing with the wrong cute little robot.
-Blast them! -I'm sorry, Mai. But I can't.
translation.zh: -轰他们-对不起 小麦 我做不到

translation.en: -What? -I--
-[swoosh] -[Molly] Mai, what is going on here?
You know what? That is a great question.
translation.zh: 没错 这个问题问得好

translation.en: What is he doing?
[Mai] Use your guns! Use your plasma thingy.
translation.zh: 快开枪 你的离子枪

translation.en: Get back, it's not safe.
-Uh-oh. -Okay, fine.
Whose dog is this?
[Q-Bot] Hey, guys.
Did he just explode? We gotta go back, we gotta get mom.
translation.zh: 他自己爆炸了？我们得回去救妈妈

translation.en: -Mai! -Mom.
[Molly] Mai!
-[army robot] Surround the target. -Why aren't you stopping to help her?
translation.zh: -包围目标-你干嘛？ 为什么不停下来救她？

translation.en: No!
Wow, what a scuffle. It looks--
translation.zh: 哇 好一通混战 看起来…

translation.en: Put me down! Stop, just stop!
What is wrong with you?
They took my mom!
I'm sorry, I couldn't stop them.
translation.zh: 对不起 我没法阻止他们

translation.en: This is how you got my back?
I thought you were some kind of superhero.
translation.zh: 我还以为你是超级英雄

translation.en: But you just stood by and let them take her.
translation.zh: 可以只能眼睁睁看着她被抓走

translation.en: -You let them. -I didn't let them.
I had nothing to fight them with.
-What? -I deleted my weapon control systems.
translation.zh: -什么？-我把武器控制系统删了

translation.en: What? Why would you do that?
Because I was out of memory.
There was nothing I could delete that wasn't you.
translation.zh: 只剩下关于你的记忆 不能删

translation.en: Okay, so your precious robot memories
translation.zh: 所以你宝贵的机器人记忆

translation.en: are more important than my mother's life? Is that it?
translation.zh: 比我妈的生命还重要 是吗？

translation.en: Is that what you're saying?
I hope that's not what you're saying.
translation.zh: 我希望你不是这个意思

translation.en: I know I messed up,
but I had no choice. I had to save you.
translation.zh: 但我没有选择 必须救你

translation.en: I can't lose you, Mai.
translation.zh: 我不能失去你 小麦

translation.en: My parents are gone.
The second I believe this thing between us is real
translation.zh: 我刚开始觉得和你之间的感情是真的

translation.en: you burn it down to the ground like everyone else does!
translation.zh: 你就像其他人一样 把它毁掉了

translation.en: Look, remember this.
I'm bailing first.
You okay, kiddo?
-I have you now, princess. -No!
-Get your hands off me. -Okay, come on--
Mai, don't do this by yourself.
translation.zh: 小麦 别自己一个人上

translation.en: -I don't need you. -Come on. Just listen to me.
translation.zh: -我不需要你-别这样 听我说

translation.en: Hi, you are in violation--
-Please stop fighting me. -[robot] Huh.
Mai, I'm trying to help.
[sarcastically] Oh, good! Weapons would help. Did you bring any weapons this time?
translation.zh: 好的 武器会有帮助 这次带了吗？

translation.en: -It doesn't work like that. -I don't know about you,
translation.zh: -不是这样的-你怎么想我不知道

translation.en: but a rocket launcher would make me feel a whole lot better.
translation.zh: 但我想来个火箭发射器会好得多

translation.en: [7723] If I brought my weapons back online,
the process would purge my entire memory.
translation.zh: 我全部的记忆都会丢失

translation.en: I'd forget everything I've ever learned.
translation.zh: 我学到的一切都会忘记

translation.en: [sarcastically] Oh, real tragedy.
-I wouldn't know who to fight anymore. -Whatever, I can fight alone.
translation.zh: -我连该跟谁作战都会不知道-算了 我自己一个人来吧

translation.en: -I've been doing it my whole life. -You are not alone!
translation.zh: -我一辈子都这样-不会让你一个人上的

translation.en: I'm always alone. This time-- -[sirens wailing] -This time's no different.
translation.zh: 我一直是一个人 这次也不例外

translation.en: [security robot] You are now surrounded--
You're right. I let you down.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我让你失望了

translation.en: A lot of people let you down, but you are not alone.
translation.zh: 很多人让你失望了 但你并不孤独

translation.en: [Mai] If I'm not alone that means I've brought you down into my garbage life.
translation.zh: 如果我不孤独说明我把你带入了我的垃圾生活

translation.en: Is that really where you want to be?
[7723] Nowhere else.
I miss him.
Everyday.
And everyday, I'm mad at him for leaving.
translation.zh: 我每天都怪他离开我们

translation.en: Look at us.
Quite a team we make-- A broken robot and a broken little girl.
translation.zh: 好一对组合 一个破碎的机器人一个破碎的小女孩

translation.en: It's more than I could have ever asked for.
translation.zh: 能这样我已经很满足了

translation.en: What do you say we go and get your mother? Together?
translation.zh: 不如我们一起去救你妈妈

translation.en: We're going to get our butts kicked without your weapons.
translation.zh: 没有你的武器 我们会被揍得很惨

translation.en: -You know that, don't you? -Oh, yeah for sure.
translation.zh: -你知道的 对吧？-清楚知道

translation.en: [security robots] Violation. Alert. Alert.
-[7723] Let's go. Come on. -[sirens wailing]
-Momo! -What?
Alert. Alert.
-Hold up! You guys hear that? -[indistinct conversation in distance]
-Momo, shh! -[7723] Wait.
-[Momo] She's that way! -Momo said she's this way, come on.
translation.zh: -她在那里-馍馍说她在那里 走吧

translation.en: Wait, Momo says?
"Momo says?"
I don't need that. I have a copy of that.
translation.zh: 这个不需要 有备份了

translation.en: All right, maybe I can try that. Where did I see--
translation.zh: 好的 或许可以试试这个 哪里看见…

translation.en: Where did I put it, I know I-- I have money.
translation.zh: 放哪里了 我知道…我有钱

translation.en: Oh, you're here. We're saved!
translation.zh: 噢 你们来了 我们有救了

translation.en: Hey, hey! Guys, wait. Oh, goodness.
translation.zh: 嗨！各位 等等 我的天啊

translation.en: Where's my mom, nerd shirt?
translation.zh: 我妈在哪里 死呆子？

translation.en: Ignore that, that's a trap.
-There's no way I'll ignore that. -No, listen.
translation.zh: -我怎么可能不管-不 听我说

translation.en: We can save your mother.
We can save everybody, but we have to stop Ares to do it.
translation.zh: 可以救大家 但必须先要阻止战王

translation.en: What? Who cares about Ares if that Justin Pin guy is the problem?
translation.zh: 什么？谁管战王啊庞贾廷才是问题所在

translation.en: No, you don't understand. It's not Pin.
translation.zh: 你不懂 不是庞贾廷

translation.en: He isn't...
I mean he...
He lost all patience for tedious backstory?
translation.zh: 没耐性说冗长的背景故事了？

translation.en: Yeah? [laughs]
These guys again?
I think that's just about enough, Dr. Tanner Rice.
translation.zh: 差不多了 米大力博士

translation.en: Tell me where you're keeping my mother!
translation.zh: 你把我妈妈藏在哪里了？

translation.en: Oh, right. The human woman. Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: 哦对 那个女性人类 我的天

translation.en: I had created the perfect trap for you guys.
translation.zh: 我为你们设下了天罗地网

translation.en: -Hold up. -What?
What do you mean human woman?
translation.zh: 你说女性人类 什么意思？

translation.en: What? What do you mean, what do I mean?
translation.zh: 你什么意思 我什么意思？

translation.en: I mean, who talks like that?
Normal humans do. [chuckles nervously] [stuttering] I mean, I do. Because I do normal human things
translation.zh: 正常人类就这么说话我就是像正常人类一样说话

translation.en: all the time. All the time.
Literally, you could ask any other human if I--
translation.zh: 真的 你随便问哪个人类

translation.en: You won't get away with this. He can't hide forever.
translation.zh: 你逃不掉的 不可能隐瞒一辈子

translation.en: -You know, people will find out-- -[zapping]
-You know what, never mind. -No!
[robot, low-pitched voice] Now it's time to finish this. [flying robot] All right, Dr. Rice. Time to go.
translation.zh: -现在轮到我来结束这一切了-好的 米博士 该走了

translation.en: You said two minutes, it's been two minutes.
translation.zh: 你说了两分钟 已经两分钟了

translation.en: Oh, hey Ares.
[Mai] Nope.
-Give me a D! -[blast]
-[man] It's Justin! -[crowd whooping]
[7723] Oh, come on...
Oh, no!
-[robot] So, then I go back and get him-- -[Mai] Go get the cops!
But Dr. Rice is dead. I have to take some time to process this.
translation.zh: 但米博士已经死了我得要点时间消化一下

translation.en: Okay, get the cops. Get the cops.
translation.zh: 好的 报警 报警

translation.en: Mom!
Momo, come on!
-[muffled] -Mom, are you okay?
Oh, Mai. My baby!
-Mom-- -I'm so sorry.
I should've paid more attention. You felt so all alone.
translation.zh: 我应该给你更多关心的你感到孤单 都是我不好

translation.en: I should've given you a hug, but I was alone too
translation.zh: 以前应该多抱你 但我也孤单

translation.en: and thought robots were my answer. But you're my answer!
translation.zh: 我以为机器人能给我慰藉但只有你才能帮我

translation.en: I hope that I'm your answer. You were so right and I was wrong.
translation.zh: 我希望我也能帮你你说得太对了 我错得没边了

translation.en: I love you so, so much!
Wow, yeah. I love you too.
But listen, Pin wants to kill all these people
translation.zh: 不过听我说庞贾廷想把这些人都杀死

translation.en: you need to help me get them out of here.
translation.zh: 你得帮我把他们救出去

translation.en: They're never going to believe you.
I am a beloved public figure.
translation.zh: 我是受人敬仰的公众人物

translation.en: And they do whatever I want them to.
translation.zh: 我让他们做什么 他们都会照做

translation.en: [echoing over P.A.] These morons are lining up to pay for the bombs
I'm going to use to kill-- Hold on, wait a second.
translation.zh: 我会用这些炸弹杀死…等一下

translation.en: Am I...
Am I hearing an echo?
Hello. Do you guys hear that? Can anyone else hear an echo?
translation.zh: 你好 你们听到了吗？能听到回声吗？

translation.en: Give me that!
[Mai] All of you, listen, now!
The Q-Bots are bombs!
Head for the exits. Why is no one running?
translation.zh: 前往出口 为什么还不跑？

translation.en: Run, right now! Get away while you can!
translation.zh: 快跑 趁现在还来得及！

translation.en: Ah! You. Are. A. Mean. Puppet!
Oh, why did you do that? [low-pitched] I'm just trying to help!
translation.zh: 你为什么要这样？我只是想做好事

translation.en: No, no!
Okay, fine! I killed Justin Pin and stole his body.
translation.zh: 好吧！我杀了庞贾廷然后偷了他的尸体

translation.en: Boo!
[Justin and Ares voices in unison] "Boo-hoo!" Shut up!
The guy's dead. Get over it!
translation.zh: 他死了 接受现实吧

translation.en: You know what he said to me? "You're perfect," he said.
translation.zh: 你们知道他对我说了什么吗？他说我很完美

translation.en: "Now go make the world perfect."
translation.zh: 现在 把世界变完美

translation.en: You want the world to be a better place?
You humans are what's wrong with it.
translation.zh: 你们人类才是最大的问题

translation.en: -You're flawed and you're broken. -Keep talking, crazy pants.
translation.zh: -你们有瑕疵 破碎不堪-嘴巴别停 疯子

translation.en: [Justin] The only way this world gets perfect...
translation.zh: 使世界完美的唯一办法

translation.en: is with all of you dead!
Maybe I'll start with killing this one?
Get your hands off of her!
Put your [bleep] finger on my daughter--
[Ares] I guess I don't have to wear the man's suit anymore.
translation.zh: 看来不必再穿人的衣服了

translation.en: Let's just scrub ahead to the everyone dies part, shall we?
translation.zh: 抓紧时间进入人类灭亡的环节吧

translation.en: Have at it!
Don't leave yet. [zapping]
Oh, snap!
-Momo, come on. -[barks]
-You just lost a very loyal customer! -Okay, Mom.
translation.zh: -你失去了一个非常忠实的顾客！-好了 妈妈

translation.en: [Justin] Every home. Gorgeous.
Oh, my god! Mai, I've never felt so close to you.
translation.zh: 我的天！小麦 我从未感觉与你如此亲近

translation.en: -Ah! Mai! -Mom!
-[Greenwood] Ah! Stay away, you freaks! -[Mai] Heads up!
translation.zh: 滚开 怪物 小心！

translation.en: [Greenwood] That was amazing!
-Yeah, cool. -Mai, I'm sorry about what happened.
translation.zh: -没事-小麦 以前的事我很抱歉

translation.en: Okay? I didn't mean to hurt you or anybody.
translation.zh: 我不是有意要伤害你或其他人的

translation.en: -And I know you weren't-- -Can we do this later?
translation.zh: -我知道你不…-之后再说这个好吗？

translation.en: All right, okay.
[Mai] Follow me, it's our last chance!
translation.zh: 跟着我 这是我们最后的机会

translation.en: [man] Look out! Hurry up!
[Mai] Come on!
Ow!
-Mai, what are you doing? Come on! -I'm going back for them.
translation.zh: 小麦 你干嘛啊？走吧！ 我回去救他们

translation.en: Hello, pr-pr-princess.
You don't have to fight.
It never stops...
and it never fixes anything.
translation.zh: 武力解决不了任何问题

translation.en: [Ares] You have been ruined by that human child.
translation.zh: 你已经被那个人类小孩毁了

translation.en: Humans are the imperfection I mean to correct.
translation.zh: 人类不完美 我要纠正这一切

translation.en: No one is perfect!
[Ares] I am!
[Ares] Don't you get it?
You're as broken as they are.
translation.zh: 你和他们一样支离破碎

translation.en: But my world... My world will be perfect.
No more pain, no more conflict.
translation.zh: 没有疼痛 没有冲突

translation.en: No more injustice.
No humanity.
You are very evil.
[Ares] Ah, agree to disagree.
Oh, hey. Look what the meat puppet dragged in.
translation.zh: 对了 看看我的人皮玩偶把谁带来了

translation.en: You are not ruining this for me.
Mai!
[Greenwood] Let her go, you weird old dude.
translation.zh: 放开她 你这古怪的老家伙

translation.en: -Don't make me kick your butt. -Greenwood, what are you doing?
translation.zh: -别逼我踢你屁股-花木青 你来干嘛？

translation.en: Get out of here, go!
I am a stupid robot!
translation.zh: 我的确是愚蠢的机器人！

translation.en: [motherboard] Warning, you are about to begin a full system reset.
translation.zh: 危险 你将进行完全系统重置

translation.en: All memories will be lost.
translation.zh: 清除的记忆将无法恢复

translation.en: -Are you sure you want to do this? -[7723] Yes.
translation.zh: 确定要进行该项操作吗？ 是的

translation.en: [motherboard] Beginning now. Memory deleted.
translation.zh: 现在开始 记忆已删除

translation.en: Weapons available.
[7723] I've got your back.
Holy crab stacks.
-Thank you. -Mai, listen to me.
Our memories make us who we are.
translation.zh: 我们的记忆决定我们是什么样的人

translation.en: Don't let the bad ones stop you from making good ones.
translation.zh: 忘记不好 记住美好

translation.en: [slow-motion] What are you talking about?
[motherboard] Memories deleting.
Weapons restoring.
Are you okay?
Look out!
Your weapons...
[7723] You are amazing. Go make new memories.
translation.zh: 你很棒 活出新的精彩吧

translation.en: [Ares] Stop wasting your time.
[Mai] What-- What are you...
No!
[motherboard echoing] Memories deleting.
[motherboard] Full system reset successful, main memory initialized.
translation.zh: 完全系统重置成功主记忆模块已初始化

translation.en: Hey!
Are you there?
Please come back. I'm-I'm sorry, I-I was wrong.
translation.zh: 请回来吧 对不起 我错了

translation.en: Please, please. Don't be gone.
Aw, stop it.
You're going to make me cry.
Not really. [digital stutter] I'm kidding.
translation.zh: 其实没有 我开玩笑的

translation.en: Move aside little human.
No, don't! Stay away from him.
No! You do not get to touch him.
[Ares] What is it with you people? It's like you thrive on futility.
translation.zh: 你们是怎么回事 净做无用功？

translation.en: -[gun energizes] -There we go.
Oh, well.
Perfect.
-[Momo barks, growls] -Hey!
What are you--
-Whose dog is this? -[Mai] He's mine!
You stupid robot!
-What? -Don't!
Oh, no!
Mai!
You were trying to tell me and I...
translation.zh: 你是想要告诉我 而…

translation.en: Those memories were all you had and...
translation.zh: 这些记忆是你所仅有的

translation.en: You gave them up, for me.
translation.zh: 而你却为了我而舍弃了

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
Just please...
Don't be gone.
Hello. What's your name?
translation.zh: 你好 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: -I can keep this? -You can keep it.
Hey, Momo. This is Momo.
-He's a good guy, okay? -Okay.
translation.zh: -他是个好家伙 记住了吗？-记住了

translation.en: -Hello, Momo. -S'up, buddy?
translation.zh: -你好 馍馍-你好 哥们儿

translation.en: Hey, sweetie.
How's he doing?
Better.
I think.
No! No, no, no!
It's okay, you're okay.
I've got your back.
"I got your back."
Oh, man.
What? I'm allergic to pollen. Are you judging me?
translation.zh: 怎么？我花粉过敏 你有意见啊？

translation.en: -Hey, Mai. You ready? -Oh hey, dude!
translation.zh: -嗨 小麦 准备好了吗？-嗨 哥们儿

translation.en: You girls have fun now.
Come on, let's go.
Mai, what are you waiting for? You ready?
translation.zh: 小麦 来吧 等什么呢？ 准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Momo] It's from generations of inbreeds. My ancestors were wolves, bruh.
translation.zh: 这种是近亲繁殖 我的祖先是狼 兄弟

translation.en: Come on!
[Greenwood] You can play too, but hurry it up.
translation.zh: 你也可以踢 不过快点

translation.en: -[girl] Bring it. -[boy] I'll be the goalie.
[Ani] Over here.
[Greenwood] You're good, but not as good as me.
translation.zh: 踢得不错 不过我踢得更好

translation.en: -Nice try. -I'm open!
[kid] He's so cool!
-What do you call him? -[Mai] My friend.
translation.zh: 他真酷！他到底是谁啊？ 我朋友

translation.en: ♪ Gone are the dark clouds The dawn has come ♪
